An Alan Smithee Film: Burn Hollywood Burn

Ano: 1997

IMDb ID: tt0118577

Classificação: 3.5

Sinopse: Director Alan Smithee comes to Hollywood to make a movie. Due to a variety of factors, he decides to disown it and direct it under a pseudonym. Unfortunately, the Director's Guild requires that if a director disowns a movie in this fashion, he *must* use the official Director's Guild pseudonym...which happens to be Alan Smithee.—Afterburner
